author: Cloveious
title: It's a basic Santa Clause!
review:
I got this set from my Grandma as stocking stuffer Christmas of 1991 and I have always kept it intact as reminder of my Grandma and better times.

It is cute for what it is, easy to build and the pieces are common aside from the printed face. The one annoyance I have is the gift bag always falls off. It is to heavy to be held by one stud.

It currently is being used as a statue in the park of my little Lego Town.

This item was defiantly available in Canada despite the "US only" note.
